Alien swarm est un très bon jeu avec du potentiel seulement il est beaucoup trop pauvre en contenu et cela fait qu'on s'en lasse très vite.

Les + :

La difficulté est présente
Bonne mécanique de jeu
Grand choix d'armes
Coopération

Les - :

Très peu de contenu
Partie un poil trop rapide
Niveaux pas assez long

Conclusion :

Alien swarm vaut le coup d'etre essayer malgrés le fait qu'il manque de contenu mais c'est un très bon jeu. Je vous le recommande si vous voulez jouer a plusieurs dessus entre amis.

Hace Tiempo me terminé una 100 veces la campaña en diferentes cuentas, pero entrar nuevamente y comenzar de nuevo fue mi mejor opción... Por mas que nada cambie sigue siendo el mejor juego de la historia de steam y del gaming en general. (mi opinion.)

 y de nuevo... Gracias Valve por asustarme, hacerme reír, y enseñarme lo importante que es un medico. (en este juego)

If you are looking for an action shooter with team cooperation where mindless running will get you killed this is a game for You. On most dificulties the games enemies coming in waves enforce cooperation. Fireing lanes start to matter and even when you are not on point but securing the back You feel like Your job matters. 

The game offers 8 marines to pick from. A pair of each of 4 archetypes. The medic, whos main role is to heal any damage and cure infestations. The Autogunner whos there to push the group forward or to set up supressing fire defending the group. The demolitions marine is best suited to dealing with heavier targets with the use of flamethrowers, mines grenades fire traps and the mean end of a shotgun. Finaly theres the technician for those who want to make the missions easier by welding doors and hacking security and objectives. 

Individual skill is rewarded with all of these archetypes without the loss of sense of benefiting from the teamwork of entire group. 

The setting pays hommage to classic movies and games of the alien franchise yet remains its own kind of alien style with a bit more arcade look. The topdown camera gives a more tactical feel for the gameplay in comparission to first person. Each marine has his own quips and oneliners, and character. 

Since its free i cannot see how you wouldnt recommend it.
Fun for the whole family! Most enjoyable when playing with friends.
Its free

Great game. I personally found the missions repetitive when I played through it again, though this would be less of an issue playing with friends. Progression is great and the weapons and gadgets are awesome. Strongly recommended co-op game. 

And since I have no friends, I play with AI companions. That's right, you can. It's limited and a bit twitchy, but it works great. See here: http://forums.blackcatgames.com/showthread.php?t=12996

Happy hunting.
